name: Quacktum Entanglement
description:
Welcome to the Quacktum enganglement, a mind-bending puzzle game about time travel! Plan your route and carefully lead your minions so that they can guide your character to safety. As brave as your chicken-like helpers are, there are obstacles they cannot overcome. Fortunately, the duck gods gave you an access to the ancient quantum tape recorder - a device which allows you to control the time and rewind the actions your minions took, while the environment still moves forward in time.

Good luck, 20 challenging levels await!

Code, design, music and most of the sfx done by me.

Art based on Paper Pixels asset pack - https://v3x3d.itch.io/paper-pixels

Playback clicking sound by https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/
